src_original: dhanyābhijñā mṛdumateḥ kṣiprābhijñetarasya tu // VAkK_6.66 // [382/18-382/19]  mṛdvindriyasya sukhā duḥkhā vā pratipaddhandhābhijñā tīkṣṇendriyasya kṣiprābhijñā dhandhābhijñā asyāṃ pratipadi / [382/19]  evaṃ kṣiprābhijñā / [382/20]  dhandhasya vā pudgalasyeyamiti dhandhābhijñā / [382/20-382/21]  punarapyeṣa mārgo bodhipakṣyākhyāṃ labhate / [382/21]  saptatriṃśadvodhipakṣā dharmāḥ /
tgt_original: 未來定者有慧少定，三空有定少慧，中間定者分不具故，定慧皆少，以是義故名為苦道。 此之二道，若信根人得名為遲行，若智根人得名為速行。

src_original: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni / [382/22]  catvāri samyak prahāṇāni /  catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ /  pañcendriyāṇi / [382/22-382/23]  pañca balāni / [382/23]
tgt_original: 是八分聖道，約定約根故有四行。

src_original: sapta bodhyaṅgāni /  āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ iti /
tgt_original: 復次聖道或說三十七助覺。

src_original: tatra [382/24]  anutpādakṣayajñāne bodhiḥ [383/01]  kṣayajñānamanutpādajñānaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 何法為覺？ 以盡智、無生智名之為覺。

src_original: pudgalabhedena tisro bodhaya utpadyante / [383/01-383/02]  śrāvakabodhiḥ pratyekabodhiranuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti / [383/02]  aśeṣāvidyāprahāṇāt / [383/02-383/03]
tgt_original: 由三種人成三品覺，謂聲聞菩提、辟支菩提、無上菩提，能滅無明令無餘故。

src_original: tābhyāṃ svarthasya yathābhūta kṛtāpunaḥkartavyatāvavodhācca / [383/04]
tgt_original: 是自事已作不復更作，如實覺故，是名為覺。

src_original: tasmādanyathā tatsvabhāvo yaktavyaḥ / [092/02-092/03]
tgt_original: 是故應別方便說其體相。

src_original: āryaireva tatsvabhāvaḥ pratyātmavedyaḥ / [092/03]  etāvaktu śakyate vaktum nityaṃ kuśalaṃ cāsti dravyāntaram / [092/03-092/04]  tadvisaṃyogaścocyate pratisaṃkhyānirodhaśceti / [092/04]
tgt_original: 聖人無分別證智所知，是其體相，如是可說為善異於餘物，或說名結離，或說思擇滅。

src_original: sarvamevāsaṃskṛtamadravyamiti sautrāntikāḥ / [092/05]
tgt_original: 諸經師說： 一切無為，非是物有。 何以故？

src_original: nahi tadrūpavedanādiyat bhāvāntaramasti /
tgt_original: 不如色受有於別物。

src_original: kiṃ tarhi /
tgt_original: 何者？

src_original: spraṣṭavyābhāvamātramākāśam / [092/06]
tgt_original: 唯以無觸名為虛空。

src_original: tadyathā hyandhakāre pratidhātamavindanta ākāśamityāhuḥ / [092/06-092/07]
tgt_original: 如經言： 闇中無礙無覆名為虛空。

src_original: utpannānuśayajanmanirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyāvalenānyasyānutpādaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ / [092/07-092/08]  vinaiva pratisaṃkhyayā pratyayavaikalayādanutpādo yaḥ so /  pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ / [092/08-092/09]  tadyathā nikāyasabhāgaśeṣasyāntarāmaraṇe / [092/09]
tgt_original: 由般若力與現在隨眠惑體性相違，餘後不生，名思擇滅。 離此思擇，因緣不具餘不得生，是名非思擇滅，譬如一期中間橫死殘果不續。

src_original: nikāyāntarīyāḥ punarāhuḥ / [092/09-092/10]
tgt_original: 異部師說：

src_original: anuśayānāmutpattau prajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamato 'sau pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ / [092/10-092/11]  yastu punaḥ duḥkhasyānutpādaḥ saḥ utpādakāraṇānuśayavaikalyādeveti na tasminprajñāyāḥ sāmarthyamastyato 'sāvapratisaṃkhyānirodha iti / [092/12]
tgt_original: 隨眠煩惱後不得生，是思擇力故，名思擇滅。 由緣不具後苦不生，是中思擇無力，故說非思擇滅。 論曰：

src_original: so 'pi tu nāntareṇa pratisaṃkhyāṃ sidhyatīti pratisamkhyānirodha evāsau / [092/12-092/13]
tgt_original: 是義不然。 若離思擇此滅不成故，知屬思擇滅。

src_original: ya evotpannasya paścādabhāvaḥ sa eva svarasa nirodhādapratisaṃkhyānirodha ityapare / [092/13-092/14]
tgt_original: 又諸部說： 若法已生、生後自滅，自性滅故，名非思擇滅。
